text: The British royal family are a lot gentler today than in days gone by. Many historic royals led explosive lives that revolved around death and controversy, and the palaces they called home bore witness to their dramatic intrigues. Perhaps as a result of these times, todays palaces are rich in ghost stories and sightings.
